ai.summary: A gentle 3.3 km woodland walk in the UK, known as Ancient Tree Walk, featuring ancient trees and shaded paths. Easy terrain suitable for families and beginners.
ai.terrain_summary: Flat to gently undulating woodland trail with well-marked paths. Mostly firm underfoot, but expect some exposed roots and sections of shade.
ai.safety_notes: Stay on marked paths, wear sturdy footwear, and bring a light waterproof layer. Be mindful of uneven ground, roots, and wet leaves, especially after rain. Carry water and a small map or smartphone for navigation, check daylight hours for winter visits, and inform someone of your plan. Supervise children closely and be aware of wildlife along the trail.
recommended_gear: Snacks and a small first-aid kit
Sun protection (sunscreen, sunglasses) for sunny days
ai.best_seasons: Year-round, with especially pleasant conditions in spring and autumn when temperatures are mild and the woodland scenery is at its best.

seo.meta_description: Explore Ancient Tree Walk, an easy 3.3 km forest trail in the UK. Perfect for families and beginners seeking a short, shaded hike among ancient trees.
